tha-ap399:4.3: pitā matā bhātā → mātā pitā ca bhātā ca (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap399:16.2: saṃ tacaṃ → santavaṃ (bj) | santanuṃ (s2, s3, mr) | saṃ tanuṃ (pts1)
tha-ap399:18.2: girimañjariṃ → girimañjarimapūjayiṃ (bj) | girimañjari pūjayiṃ (s2, s3) | girapañjaliṃ pūjayiṃ (pts1)
tha-ap399:18.3: Dibbagandhaṃ sampavantaṃ → dibbagandhena sampannaṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap399:24.2: atulopi → atulo ca (bj) | atulopi (s2, s3) | mahāsamuddo vākkhobbho atulo pi (pts1)
